attributes.action: Public transport should have more hygiene cleaning  by cleaning the seats
attributes.additional_details: The seats are full of dust if you slap the seat a full bag of dust comes out
attributes.background: Get cleaners and clean the seats

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Responsibility for local public transport is devolved to local councils or Mayors, and national public transport is the responsibility of individual transport operators.
